title: Reboot Droid [ROOT]
summary: Reboot your phone to any mode with a tap of a button.

descriptionHTML:
Reboot your phone to any mode with Reboot Droid!

Reboot Droid can reboot your Android phone to any mode like Recovery or Download mode; see full list at the bottom.

Requires Android 2.3+ and root rights.

Includes:
• Normal Reboot
• Soft/Hot Reboot
• Recovery Mode
• Bootloader/Download Mode
• Power Off
comments: What the hell? I downloaded, and every button I tapped said "There is a problem rebooting your device." Uninstalling.
